page.title: 18St.Germans School
page.content:
St.Germans school was built in 1879, from funds raised locally. It has served the younger children of the area ever since, and now has 65 children aged 4 to 11, and 4 teachers.
The original stone building is little altered, but recently added false ceilings inside cut the noise down.
The school used to have over 100 pupils, but numbers are steadily declining. Few village families now have young children, and there are hardly any new houses being built, so this trend is expected to continue.
